trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control retrieves data as a <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref> or <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> enumeration is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> controls to describe the data retrieval mode that the data source control uses when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method is called.
When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to DataSet, data is loaded into a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> structure.
This enables scenarios where user interface controls such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> offer sorting and paging capabilities.

When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to DataReader, data is retrieved by an <xref:System.Data.IDataReader> object, which is a read-only, forward-only cursor.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode.DataReader> enumeration is only used to describe how the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> command retrieves data; it has no effect on other operations the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> control performs, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Update%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Delete%2A>.
Retrieves data from the underlying data storage as an <xref href="System.Data.IDataReader"></xref>
Retrieves data from the underlying data storage into a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> structure.
